summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: LUCINE LASHES MINK COLLECTION -"Bia" - False Mink Eyelashes - Natural False Eyelashes for Thickness, Length and Volume - Reusable, Non-Irritating and Easy to Apply (Black) Review Date: 2017/08/19 Store: LUCINE LASHES Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'LUCINE LASHES', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 2.3 x 0.6 inches', 'UPC': '707129687159'} Review Text: These eyelashes are very soft and natural feeling, with a sturdy base to them. I don't really care for base that looks like a thick layer of eyeliner but this one is kind of a medium thickness so it's okay. However, I have very thick hair and eyelashes that have gotten thinner over time and these lashes are so thick they look really fake on me. They look okay, but I don't think they'll ever be my "go to" lash. Still, it's obvious they're made with care and the quality appears to be very good if you're looking for thick lashes. Review Title: Quality appears to be very good Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Magic Bax Earring Lifters - 2 Pairs of Adjustable Hypoallergenic Earring Lifts (2 Pairs of 18K Gold Plated Earring Backs) As Seen on TV Review Date: 2018/02/21 Store: Allstar Innovations Product Description: ['• Get an instant earring lift with Magic Bax Earring Lifters • Helps those with bad piercings, stretched lobes and heavy earrings • Hypoallergenic and Perfect For Post Earrings • Simply slide the earring post into the Magic Bax, just like any earring back! Designed to be comfortable for all day wear • Magic Bax are adjustable to fit earring posts of various sizes'] Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Material': 'Sterling Silver', 'Color': 'Set of 4 18K Gold Plated Sterling Silver', 'Style': 'Basic- 2 Pairs 18K Gold Plated', 'Brand': 'Allstar Innovations', 'Item Weight': '0.15 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.87 x 4.17 x 0.94 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '30632', 'UPC': '740275049303', 'Manufacturer': 'Allstar Innovations'} Review Text: These are made with a clever design to ensure you are putting them on correctly. According to the enclosed instructions, you always wear them so that the heart part of the backs are on top when you slide them onto the post of your earrings. This insures that the weight of the earring pulls the heart against your ear which, in turn, counterbalances the earring and holds it securely against your ear. They're really lightweight, but they work well. I tried them on my heaviest earrings to see just how securely these backs hold and they do not disappoint. Even using them with lighter earrings you can tell they are held much more tightly and upright against your ear. They are designed so you can tighten or loosen the clasp on them so they're adjusted just the way you want them. A friend gave me a set of these for Christmas and I liked them so I bought more for myself and a couple more sets for my sisters to try. I'm happy that this set is 18K gold plated sterling silver so I won't have any problems with allergies. They are a great idea and they have a very pretty finish. Review Title: Very pretty finish Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 4 pcs COMB BANANA CLIP HAIR RISER CLAW(1Brown-1Black-1White-1Clear). Review Date: 2018/02/24 Store: Sundiego2020 Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Sundiego2020', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'White', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.43 x 5.59 x 1.46 inches; 2.57 Ounces'} Review Text: There is definitely a learning curve to using these. The first time I tried it, I ended up with a lot of hair that didn't make it into the clip. In subsequent tries, I ended up with the hairs at the very top of my head sticking up or outside the clip, and finally I ended up with the clip too far up on my head which resulted in my hair looking like a literal pony's tail! But with continued practice, this clip ends up being very comfortable to wear, looking nice overall, and my hair looks like a soft and feminine fall of hair (see photos). I'm glad I persevered because it's my preferred way to wear my hair now. Review Title: Takes a lot of practice, but it's worth it Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: WenHairCare Sweet Almond Mint - Cleanses, Nourishes and Restores the Look of Hair, No Harsh Sulfates (16 oz) Review Date: 2018/04/27 Store: LONGXTX Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.3 x 3.2 x 3.1 inches; 1.19 Pounds', 'UPC': '819763020213'} Review Text: I have very thick, shoulder-length hair with a pretty, natural curl. Many conditioners leave my hair soft but pretty much straight. When I use this conditioner, it leaves my hair soft and shiny, and tames the curl to a soft wave. I love that this conditioner leaves me with two simple, easy choices for how to wear my hair depending on my mood. I also LOVE the smell of it. Review Title: Leaves my hair soft and shiny Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pangda 7 Pieces Hair Comb 20 Teeth Rhinestone Comb Pin Clip Bridal Hair Combs Accessory for Women Girls, Assorted Colors Review Date: 2018/07/18 Store: Pangda Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'Pangda', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Number of Items': '7', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 3.94 x 0.39 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '652508265834'} Review Text: I have tried hair combs a few different times in the past without much luck. I have thick, heavy hair that has been really long for more than 40 years and no combs were ever able to hold its weight. A few years ago I cut my hair shorter. Right now it's shoulder length; not quite long enough to put in a pony tail but too long to keep it easily out of my face. I hoped these combs would be a good interim solution and I absolutely loved the color and flash of the rhinestones.

With care, and holding onto the bottom part of my hair tightly while we place the combs, we can get them to hold my hair for a few hours (see photo) but then it starts to fall out unless we put the comb toward the top of my head. Then they stay in for twice as long. Still, I never make it through a full day with them, but while they last they look really pretty! Review Title: They hold my hair for a few hours Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: BRAVE Scottish Beard Oil - A Premium Beard Oil Recipe that Smoothes, Nourishes and Thickens Beard with a Light Fresh Long Lasting Kiss-Worthy Scent.100% Natural Oils, Vegan &Cruelty Free - Made in UK! Review Date: 2018/07/29 Store: Skin Radiance Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Liquid Volume': '60 Milliliters', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Skin Radiance', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.88 x 1.65 x 1.65 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'UPC': '634304105002'} Review Text: This oil has a very soft, pleasant smell. It leaves my sweetheart's beard a bit darker, shiny enough to catch the light as he speaks or moves around, keeps it in place (I'd guess it's about a medium hold), but still leaves it soft to the touch. It lasted all day long and through the night until he showered in the morning. Review Title: Lasted all day long and through the night Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Full Body Oil Moisturizing Oil For Normal to Dry Skin Face Hair Cuticle Scalp Nails. Essential Oils, Coconut, Argan, Jojoba, Sweet Almond Oils, Organic Rose Hip Seed, Quick Dry Oil for Women & Men 4oz Review Date: 2018/10/14 Store: Ruth Paul Skin Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ruth Paul Skin', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Fl Oz', 'Skin Type': 'Dry,All Skin Types', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 3.1 x 2.1 inches; 7.04 Ounces', 'UPC': '758913623600'} Review Text: This oil has a great peppermint scent, a light feel, and absorbs quickly into my skin. I use it for many things, although I have a few favorites. I rub it into my damp hands a couple of times a day which leaves them softer and, unlike usual, my cuticles are not cracked or split (see photo 1). I spray four or five pumps into my hand, rub them together and run them through my towel-dried hair. Then I leave it to air dry and it ends up curly and soft (see photo 2) and lasts a couple of days until I wash it again. I absolutely love the versatility. Review Title: I absolutely love the versatility Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Lash Ease One Step Fiber Building Mascara- Black, Buildable Volume, Lengthens Natural Eyelashes, Lightweight, All Day Wear, 0.38oz Review Date: 2019/07/24 Store: Allstar Innovations Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Special Feature': 'Lightweight', 'Brand': 'Allstar Innovations', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Coverage': 'Buildable', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.3 x 0.71 x 0.71 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '740275051078'} Review Text: It's easy to put this mascara on without it clumping or making a mess. When I first started using it, I put on two coats which definitely defined and darkened my lashes. I could also see where it sometimes added fibers, but they were not consistent and only attached to a few of my lashes. I was not particularly impressed. However, after reading the "Customer Questions and Answers," I saw one that said I needed to "swirl the wand in the mascara before removing it from the bottle" and "use a zig-zag technique by moving the wand back and forth as you drag the wand upward." When I followed this advice, it looked WAY, WAY different than my natural lashes (see photo 1) or my lashes using two coats of another quality name-brand mascara (see photo 2). In fact, I got a DRAMATICALLY different look to my eyelashes, which definitely look longer and fuller (see photo 3). It loads a lot of mascara on the brush using this method (see photo 4).

I'm also happy that on those occasional nights when I'm too tired to worry about taking the mascara off before I go to bed, I get up with it still looking good and no fibers in my eyes. I love that it wears well and washes off easily without leaving any dark smudges under my eyes.

Overall, I think using this mascara takes some practice but the end results are worth it if you do it right! Review Title: At first I wasn't impressed. It takes some practice to get it right, but it's worth it! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: LUCINE LASHES MINK COLLECTION -"Bia" - False Mink Eyelashes - Natural False Eyelashes for Thickness, Length and Volume - Reusable, Non-Irritating and Easy to Apply (Black) Review Date: 2017/08/19 Store: LUCINE LASHES Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'LUCINE LASHES', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 2.3 x 0.6 inches', 'UPC': '707129687159'} Review Text: These eyelashes are very soft and natural feeling, with a sturdy base to them. I don't really care for base that looks like a thick layer of eyeliner but this one is kind of a medium thickness so it's okay. However, I have very thick hair and eyelashes that have gotten thinner over time and these lashes are so thick they look really fake on me. They look okay, but I don't think they'll ever be my "go to" lash. Still, it's obvious they're made with care and the quality appears to be very good if you're looking for thick lashes. I spray four or five pumps into my hand, rub them together and run them through my towel-dried hair. Then I leave it to air dry and it ends up curly and soft (see photo 2) and lasts a couple of days until I wash it again. I absolutely love the versatility. Review Title: I absolutely love the versatility Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Lash Ease One Step Fiber Building Mascara- Black, Buildable Volume, Lengthens Natural Eyelashes, Lightweight, All Day Wear, 0.38oz Review Date: 2019/07/24 Store: Allstar Innovations Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Special Feature': 'Lightweight', 'Brand': 'Allstar Innovations', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Coverage': 'Buildable', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.3 x 0.71 x 0.71 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '740275051078'} Review Text: It's easy to put this mascara on without it clumping or making a mess. When I first started using it, I put on two coats which definitely defined and darkened my lashes. I could also see where it sometimes added fibers, but they were not consistent and only attached to a few of my lashes. I was not particularly impressed. However, after reading the "Customer Questions and Answers," I saw one that said I needed to "swirl the wand in the mascara before removing it from the bottle" and "use a zig-zag technique by moving the wand back and forth as you drag the wand upward." When I followed this advice, it looked WAY, WAY different than my natural lashes (see photo 1) or my lashes using two coats of another quality name-brand mascara (see photo 2). In fact, I got a DRAMATICALLY different look to my eyelashes, which definitely look longer and fuller (see photo 3). It loads a lot of mascara on the brush using this method (see photo 4).

I'm also happy that on those occasional nights when I'm too tired to worry about taking the mascara off before I go to bed, I get up with it still looking good and no fibers in my eyes. I love that it wears well and washes off easily without leaving any dark smudges under my eyes.

Overall, I think using this mascara takes some practice but the end results are worth it if you do it right! Review Title: At first I wasn't impressed. It takes some practice to get it right, but it's worth it! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual exhibits a strong preference for beauty and grooming products, particularly those enhancing appearance and providing comfort. Ratings generally hover around the mid-4s, indicating satisfaction, with the highest-rated products showcasing effectiveness and quality. A recurring theme centers on the balance of style and practicality, as reflected in their desire for natural yet impactful beauty solutions, such as lightweight and easy-to-apply cosmetics that yield desirable results. 

Quality is paramount, with preferences leaning toward cruelty-free and hypoallergenic options, suggesting a conscientious shopping approach. The person's hair and skin care choices emphasize versatility, with products that can serve multiple purposes, indicating an appreciation for multifunctionality and ease of use. Price sensitivity appears moderate, as they seek value for quality without explicit mention of budget constraints.

In conclusion, their core preferences reveal an inclination toward high-quality, cruelty-free beauty products with an emphasis on style, effectiveness, and user-friendly features, integrated with a lifestyle geared towards achieving natural beauty with minimal effort.

target_interaction.title: Works well
target_interaction.text: This body wash/shampoo has a nice smell that is not overpowering and leaves your skin soft and hydrated.  Unlike many washes, this one doesn’t create a bunch of lather, but it sure works well.
target_interaction.title_meta: Marcus Cedarwood All Over Wash - 3-in-1 Moisturizing Beard, Body, Hair Wash for Men - Natural Vegan Mens Shower Gel Soap - USA-Made Sulfate-Free Paraben-Free Bodywash for Dry, Sensitive Skin - 500ml
features: Sulfate-Free Hair, Beard, And Body Wash For Men: This all over wash for men is free of sulfates that dry your complexion. It is a potent beard, body, and face cleanser that leaves your whole body clean and perfectly moisturized.

Paraben Free Body Wash: The Marcus shower gel body wash contains zero parabens that could put your health at risk. It is gentle with sensitive and dry skin, ideal for frequent use, safe, and efficient with all hair and beard types.

Naturally Scented With Essential Oils: Infused with high-end essential oils, this cedarwood body wash is free of synthetic fragrances and keeps your skin, hair, and facial hair scented all day long with a masculine woodsy aroma.
Vegan-Approved Body Soap: This body wash has a pure herbal formula and contains zero animal-derived ingredients. it is an all natural body wash, ideal for most types of skin, hair, and beard.

Bonus Beardcare Ebook: Scan the QR code on the beard, hair, and body wash soap and get access to useful beard care tips. Improve your daily beard grooming routine and keep your facial hair soft, healthy, tamed, and scratch-free.
